column5: Will get into Ear Falls around 8-9 PM on Fri, 7/21. Last year I noticed that there is a veterans post just east of 105. Does anyone know if they are open at that time, provide an oppurtunity to have an adult beverage and welcome US veterans? One of us is an old USN sailor (American Legion member)and the other is an old USA soldier.

Will get into Ear Falls around 8-9 PM on Fri, 7/21. Last year I noticed that there is a veterans post just east of 105. You can always give them a call to see what time they open... 807- 222-2652 thanks Smitty
